data.job_description:
Our company is expanding and we are looking for a Life Insurance Adviser to join us.
This opportunity is incredibly dynamic with no one day being the same.

We are wanting someone who is driven and wants to make the job their own.

If you think you have what it takes then click apply.

If you really want to impress us, make a profile video!!

company.company_description:
AN INSURANCE TOOLBOX, JUST FOR TRADIES BECAUSE WE DON’T WANT YOU TO BE CACTUS

We’ve taken traditional insurance and turned it on its head. We got rid of the BS and replaced it with a modern user-friendly process, understandable policies, which are perfectly in tune with the Kiwi tradie.

The result? Cactus Insurance.

job_meta.job_reason:
Our company is expanding and we are looking for a Life Insurance Adviser to join us.
This opportunity is incredibly dynamic with no one day being the same.

We are wanting someone who is driven and wants to make the job their own.

If you think you have what it takes then click apply.

If you really want to impress us, make a profile video!!

accountabilities.name: Organise sales visits and attend meetings
Represent the cactus brand each and every single day
Generate new leads and take charge of the leads provided

requirements.name: Experience in the Life Insurance industry
Can easily adapt to following our advice process

description:
Our company is expanding and we are looking for a Life Insurance Adviser to join us.
This opportunity is incredibly dynamic with no one day being the same.

We are wanting someone who is driven and wants to make the job their own.

If you think you have what it takes then click apply.

If you really want to impress us, make a profile video!!

Our company is expanding and we are looking for sales reps to join us.
This opportunity is incredibly dynamic with no one day being the same.

Make no mistake this is a sales position through and through, once fully trained you will be out seeing clients at 2 - 4 meetings each day.

We're building a team of A-Players who are willing to work incredibly hard to shake up the insurance industry and support our clients beyond the call of duty, each and every day.

If you believe you have the skills we are looking for, apply now!

If you really want to impress us create a profile video and tell us who you are!

companies.company_about_us:
AN INSURANCE TOOLBOX, JUST FOR TRADIES BECAUSE WE DON’T WANT YOU TO BE CACTUS

We’ve taken traditional insurance and turned it on its head. We got rid of the BS and replaced it with a modern user-friendly process, understandable policies, which are perfectly in tune with the Kiwi tradie.

The result? Cactus Insurance.
